info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 6 at 3:10PM ChST until November 6 at 3:45PM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Guam.
* WHEN...Until 345 PM ChST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. Rises in small streams.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 310 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 1 inches of rain have fallen over the past hour, with 1 to 4 inches already observed since this morning. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.4 to 2.2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON
